jhelp.gui.twoD

Class JHelpBorderLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpLayout
      • jhelp.gui.twoD.JHelpBorderLayout

  • public class JHelpBorderLayout
extends JHelpLayout
    BorderLayout for 2D.
    Imagine the panel cut like this :
    (1)TOP-LEFT (2)TOP (3)TOP-RIGHT
    (4)LEFT (5)CENTER (6)RIGHT
    (7)BOTTOM-LEFT (8)BOTTOM (9)BOTTOM-RIGHT
    It allows you to place each component in each above cell or take all the top (1+2+3), all the left(1+4+7), all the right (3+6+9), or all the bottom (7+8+9)
    Author:
    JHelp
